hint: Apply safe, proven optimizations: push filters into subqueries, filter dimension tables early to reduce join size, and materialize repeated computations.
Isolate filtered dimension tables (date, store, household_demographics) into separate CTEs before joining with the fact table to enable predicate pushdown and reduce intermediate results.
Restructure with multiple CTEs: pre-filter dimensions, pre-join with fact table in stages, and consolidate aggregations into a single pass to minimize full table scans.
Apply structural transformations: split OR conditions into UNION ALL, convert INTERSECT patterns to EXISTS for better join planning, and decorrelate subqueries to enable independent optimization.
